00020   using namespace std;

00022   void PolygonArea::AddPoint(real lat, real lon) throw() {
00023     if (_num == 0) {
00024       _lat0 = _lat1 = lat;
00025       _lon0 = _lon1 = lon;
00026     } else {
00027       real s12, S12, t;
00028       _earth.GenInverse(_lat1, _lon1, lat, lon, _mask, s12, t, t, t, t, t, S12);
00029       _perimetersum += s12;
00030       if (!_polyline) {
00031         _areasum += S12;
00032         _crossings += transit(_lon1, lon);
00033       }
00034       _lat1 = lat;
00035       _lon1 = lon;
00036     }
00037     ++_num;
00038   }
00039 
00040   unsigned PolygonArea::Compute(bool reverse, bool sign,
00041                                 real& perimeter, real& area) const throw() {
00042     real s12, S12, t;
00043     if (_num < 2) {
00044       perimeter = 0;
00045       if (!_polyline)
00046         area = 0;
00047       return _num;
00048     }
00049     if (_polyline) {
00050       perimeter = _perimetersum();
00051       return _num;
00052     }
00053     _earth.GenInverse(_lat1, _lon1, _lat0, _lon0, _mask,
00054                       s12, t, t, t, t, t, S12);
00055     perimeter = _perimetersum(s12);
00056     Accumulator<real> tempsum(_areasum);
00057     tempsum += S12;
00058     int crossings = _crossings + transit(_lon1, _lon0);
00059     if (crossings & 1)
00060       tempsum += (tempsum < 0 ? 1 : -1) * _area0/2;
00061     // area is with the clockwise sense.  If !reverse convert to
00062     // counter-clockwise convention.
00063     if (!reverse)
00064       tempsum *= -1;
00065     // If sign put area in (-area0/2, area0/2], else put area in [0, area0)
00066     if (sign) {
00067       if (tempsum > _area0/2)
00068         tempsum -= _area0;
00069       else if (tempsum <= -_area0/2)
00070         tempsum += _area0;
00071     } else {
00072       if (tempsum >= _area0)
00073         tempsum -= _area0;
00074       else if (tempsum < 0)
00075         tempsum += _area0;
00076     }
00077     area = 0 + tempsum();
00078     return _num;
00079   }
00080 
00081   unsigned PolygonArea::TestCompute(real lat, real lon, bool reverse, bool sign,
00082                                     real& perimeter, real& area) const throw() {
00083     if (_num == 0) {
00084       perimeter = 0;
00085       if (!_polyline)
00086         area = 0;
00087       return 1;
00088     }
00089     perimeter = _perimetersum();
00090     real tempsum = _polyline ? 0 : _areasum();
00091     int crossings = _crossings, num = _num + 1;
00092     for (int i = 0; i < (_polyline ? 1 : 2); ++i) {
00093       real s12, S12, t;
00094       _earth.GenInverse(i == 0 ? _lat1 : lat, i == 0 ? _lon1 : lon,
00095                         i != 0 ? _lat0 : lat, i != 0 ? _lon0 : lon,
00096                         _mask, s12, t, t, t, t, t, S12);
00097       perimeter += s12;
00098       if (!_polyline) {
00099         tempsum += S12;
00100         crossings += transit(i == 0 ? _lon1 : lon,
00101                              i != 0 ? _lon0 : lon);
00102       }
00103     }
00104 
00105     if (_polyline)
00106       return num;
00107 
00108     if (crossings & 1)
00109       tempsum += (tempsum < 0 ? 1 : -1) * _area0/2;
00110     // area is with the clockwise sense.  If !reverse convert to
00111     // counter-clockwise convention.
00112     if (!reverse)
00113       tempsum *= -1;
00114     // If sign put area in (-area0/2, area0/2], else put area in [0, area0)
00115     if (sign) {
00116       if (tempsum > _area0/2)
00117         tempsum -= _area0;
00118       else if (tempsum <= -_area0/2)
00119         tempsum += _area0;
00120     } else {
00121       if (tempsum >= _area0)
00122         tempsum -= _area0;
00123       else if (tempsum < 0)
00124         tempsum += _area0;
00125     }
00126     area = 0 + tempsum;
00127     return num;
00128   }
